item.title: US-led coordination center for Gaza to be operational in coming days: Officials
item.description: To be located inside Israel, the command center will include 200 U.S. troops staffing logistics.

item.title: Nestlé cuts 16,000 jobs as part of an intensifying cost-cutting campaign
item.description: Nestlé is cutting 16,000 globally as the Swiss food giant looks to trim costs and continue with its turnaround efforts

item.title: Diane Keaton's cause of death revealed by family, report says
item.description: Actor Diane Keaton, 79, died on Oct. 11.

item.title: WATCH: Massachusetts community demands release of 13-year-old boy detained by ICE
item.description: A Massachusetts community is calling for the release of a 13-year-old boy being held by ICE in Virginia after his arrest by local law enforcement for ...

item.title: WATCH: Cartels issuing bounties up to $50,000 for hits on immigration officials, DHS says
